game.name: Detective Pig
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Detective Pig — this is a world of funny little pigs! You are a detective who, like an archangel descended from the heavens, has come to deliver justice. You will need wit and the ability to foresee the future! You will become strong. Cold. Relentless. Your name is — Sherlock Pig.
